conclusion: Consider the forces acting on the suitcase and the motion of the suitcase.
Weight of the suitcase is 15 kg, gravitational acceleration is 10 m/s², weight is 150 N.
Minimum force required to pull the suitcase is 90 N at an angle θ with respect to the horizontal direction.
Resistance force is proportional to the supporting force of the ground, ratio is μ.
Supporting force of the ground is 60 N.
Resistance force is μ times 60 N.
Force of gravity is equal to the weight of the suitcase, 150 N.
Attempt to equate forces incorrectly multiple times.
